snippet: Nick Johnson’s clutch free-throw shooting helped top-ranked Arizona come from 11 points back in the second half to beat unranked Michigan.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Arizona rallies to defeat Michigan, 72-70; other men's and women's college basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Nick Johnson’s clutch free-throw shooting helped top-ranked Arizona come from 11 points back in the second half to beat unranked Michigan.

headline.main: Free Throws Help Arizona Avoid a Costly Loss
headline.print_headline: Free Throws Help Arizona Avoid a Costly Loss
